languages.description: Führe einen Gnadenstoß bei einem Gegner aus.
languages.name: Keine Gnade

languages.description: Uccidi un Nemico con un'uccisione Mercy
languages.name: Senza Pietà

languages.description: Mata a un enemigo con Misericordia
languages.name: Sin piedad

languages.description: 对一名敌人施展怜悯之击
languages.name: 不施怜悯

languages.description: Elimine um Inimigo com a Misericórdia
languages.name: Sem Misericórdia

languages.description: กำจัดศัตรูด้วยการฆ่าแบบ Mercy
languages.name: ไร้ความเมตตา
